sectionAbout.title: About us
sectionAbout.description: If you are looking for an individual tattoo in a sterile environment, then you have come to the right place!

artists.name: Dmitriy Liubashenko
artists.title: Artist
artists.description: My name is Dima and I come from Ukraine. My preferred style is definitely realism in black and white, but I also like to adapt to other wishes and create an individual and unique design for each customer. Before the tattoo appointment, I like to arrange a personal consultation to discuss everything with the customer. I think it is important to take the time to meet and discuss different options and possibilities.

artists.name: Denis Titarev
artists.title: Artist
artists.description: My name is Denis Titarev and I'm originally from Ukraine. I've been tattooing for 8 years now. My preferred style is black and white realism, but I also like to work in all other styles. I look forward to seeing you!
